turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Please order a Venti Blonde Roast with room for cream from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to get it from the store at Lee and Mayfield in Cleveland Heights.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 12405 Cedar, Cleveland Heights.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want a freshly brewed coffee or a pour over.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a pour over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it sweetened?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to use a reusable cup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would like to get a regular cup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it lightened?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like half & half

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like Cafe Americano instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any extra shots

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many extra shots would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much caffeine is in each additional shot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Each extra shot is 75 mg of caffeine

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will order that for you.
